room_title: Escape room "Room 13" by Tri-State Escape in Huntington
review: Sooo much fun! The hour flies by. We made it out of Room 13 with 9 seconds to spare. The staff was so welcoming and provided great service. We will definitely be back to try the other two rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Room 13" by Tri-State Escape in Huntington
review: We had a great time in Room 13! This was our first escape room, but will not be our last! We will definitely be back to beat the other two rooms! The staff we encountered was great and I can't recommend this place enough.

room_title: Escape room "Room 13" by Tri-State Escape in Huntington
review: We had the best time!! We did Room 13, and it was set up perfectly. The workers were all very friendly, and I could tell they wanted us to have a good time!

room_title: Escape room "Room 13" by Tri-State Escape in Huntington
review: We loved it! Room 13 is very challenging! The owners were super nice and fun! We will definitely come back.

room_title: Escape room "Room 13" by Tri-State Escape in Huntington
review: Room 13 was definitely a challenge. We plan to come back for another try on another room. Well worth the money and a fun time!
